3/ Model usefulness:

- Einstein’s models are useful. We use them to make things like lasers!
- Mode usefulness can be 1) to do work (eg. lasers) and 2) predict (eg. weather)
- Argue why your model is more useful for 1) work or 2) prediction

981242183461191680.text:
2/ Model accuracy:

- Einstein’s equations aren’t accurate. Either are yours.
- More accuracy is not the goal, and is by definition waste if it does not make the model more useful.
- Stop arguing that your model is better because it’s more accurate.

Three keys to outperformance at scale: 

1. Hire the right people 
2. Set them up to be successful (from vision to values)
